attributes.action: Ban Mr Peter White from any and all positions the labour party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Peter White made disgusting remarks in referance to her Majesty when talking about the Diamond Jubilee celebrations (She is a parasite and vermin) even in these days of reduced standards this is beneath contempt and he should not be allowed to hold any public office

rejection.details: As a Civil Service-run website, we cannot accept any petitions about political matters. We suggest you contact the Labour Party with your concerns.
